title: (x) Saucony logo - Eurostile (customized) {Yves}
content:
Could someone please help me out with this font. I thought it was Eurostile but I guess I was wrong. Thanx in advance

saucony logo
Saucony.bmp (349.7 k)
author: bastard4life

comments.content: Somebody's been messin' about with poor ol' Eurostile.

BTW Jason, BMP files won't show up on Typophile, only GIFs   
or JPGs. Maybe read the [FAQ](http://web.archive.org/web/20111209195842/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/25290.html?1075596272) page first.
